snippet.title: Johnny Depp LOSES Libel Case Against The Sun (Amber Heard Allegation)
snippet.description:
Is Johnny Depp a wife beater? Will you still buy The Sun? Do you stand with Amber Heard or is she crying uncle? Comment down below your opinion.

Johnny Depp has been wrongly characterized by UK newsletter The Sun as a 'wife beater'. Abuse allegations against the Hollywood actor by former spouse Amber Heard has lead to lots of controversy and a court case that has recently been ruled.

The judge said, “The claimant [Depp] has not succeeded in his action for libel … 

The defendants [the Sun and News Group Newspapers] have shown that what they published […] was substantially true.”

Depp, 57, had sued the Sun’s publisher, News Group Newspapers (NGN), and its executive editor, Dan Wootton, over an article published in the Sun that originally carried the headline

“Gone Potty: How can JK Rowling be ‘genuinely happy’ casting wife beater Johnny Depp in the new Fantastic Beasts film?”

Emily Cox, a partner at the London law firm Stewarts, which specialises in libel cases, said this:

“We stand in solidarity with Amber Heard, who has shown immense bravery in speaking up and speaking out.”
